page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: There are 20 farms in our area.Most of them are small and they farm up to 90 cattle,about 3/4 of them are dairy cattle for milking and the others are calves or beef cattle.Land is used for silage and haymaking as well as grazing. Farms average around 100-150acres and this year a 165 acres farm produced 30 acres of hay and 103 acres of silage from two cuttings which weighed 42 tons.There is one pig farm.It has got more than 100 pigs.They stay for about four weeks or die before that.There are 2 intensive chicken farms one in Oakhill and one in Binegar.There are 5,000 in the one at Binegar.They come in at one day old from the hatchery and go out at about six weeks old.Then catchers come and take them back to a factory were they are then killed.
